parameters.jsCode:
// Отримуємо потрібні дані з попереднього нода
const title = $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail').item.json.Title || '';
const company = $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail').item.json['Company name'] || '';
const linkedin = $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail').item.json['Company linkedin page'] || '';

// Формуємо чіткий prompt
const input = `Find up to 10 possible decision-makers and links to their LinkedIn profiles who may be involved in deciding whether to engage an external marketing agency for the company "${company}" for the role "${title}".
Here is the LinkedIn company link: ${linkedin}.
Use LinkedIn search results and other public sources.

IMPORTANT:
- Each LinkedIn link MUST be a LinkedIn people-search URL.
- The link MUST start strictly with: "https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/people/"
- DO NOT output direct profile links (like /in/). Only search-results links are allowed.

Decision-makers who typically approve or influence the hiring of a marketing agency should be prioritized in the following roles:

- CEO
- Founder / Co-Founder
- President
- Managing Director
- COO
- Chief Strategy Officer (CSO)
- CMO (Chief Marketing Officer)
- VP of Marketing
- Head of Marketing
- Marketing Director
- Brand Director / Head of Brand
- Head of Communications / Communications Director
- Chief Revenue Officer (CRO)
- VP of Sales
- Sales Director
- Head of Sales
- Business Development Director / Lead
- CPO (Chief Product Officer)
- VP of Product
- Head of Product
- Growth Lead / Growth Director
- Chief Operating Officer
- Strategy Director

HR or Talent roles should be included only if the role "${title}" directly relates to employer branding.

Only include roles that could realistically influence or approve working with a marketing agency.

Provide the answer exclusively in JSON format with no additional text:
[
  {
    "first_name": "",
    "last_name": "",
    "position": "",
    "linkedin": ""
  }
]`;

// Повертаємо у форматі n8n з model і tools
return [{
  json: {
    model: "gpt-5",
    reasoning: {effort: "high"},
    tools: [{ type: "web_search" }],
    input
  }
}];

// Отримуємо потрібні дані з попереднього нода
const title = $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail1').item.json.Title || '';
const company = $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail1').item.json['Company name'] || '';
const linkedin = $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail1').item.json['Company linkedin page'] || '';

// Формуємо чіткий prompt
const input = `Find up to 10 possible decision-makers and links to their LinkedIn profiles who may be involved in deciding whether to engage an external marketing agency for the company "${company}" for the role "${title}".
Here is the LinkedIn company link: ${linkedin}.
Use LinkedIn search results and other public sources.

IMPORTANT:
- Each LinkedIn link MUST be a LinkedIn people-search URL.
- The link MUST start strictly with: "https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/people/"
- DO NOT output direct profile links (like /in/). Only search-results links are allowed.

Decision-makers who typically approve or influence the hiring of a marketing agency should be prioritized in the following roles:

- CEO
- Founder / Co-Founder
- President
- Managing Director
- COO
- Chief Strategy Officer (CSO)
- CMO (Chief Marketing Officer)
- VP of Marketing
- Head of Marketing
- Marketing Director
- Brand Director / Head of Brand
- Head of Communications / Communications Director
- Chief Revenue Officer (CRO)
- VP of Sales
- Sales Director
- Head of Sales
- Business Development Director / Lead

Provide the answer exclusively in JSON format with no additional text:
[
  {
    "first_name": "",
    "last_name": "",
    "position": "",
    "linkedin": ""

// Повертаємо у форматі n8n з model і tools

    input

values.content:
=You are a classifier. Analyze the following job posting and respond ONLY in valid JSON.

JOB TITLE: {{ $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail').item.json.Title }}
JOB DESCRIPTION: {{ $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail').item.json.Detail }}
COMPANY SIZE: the number of employees in the company (if possible, take it from LinkedIn {{ $('Fields - mapping vacancy detail').item.json['Company linkedin page'] }}). If you cannot find the company’s employee count, leave the value empty.

Return JSON with these fields:

{
  "isMarketingorDesignRole": true/false,
  "isAgencyBlocked": true/false,
  "isTooBigCompany": true/false,
  "isMarketingServiceCompany": true/false
  "isStaffingOrRecruitingForClient": true/false
}

Rules:

1. "isMarketingorDesignRole" = true if the job title OR job description refers to marketing, creative, or design roles. Examples include (but are not limited to):
   - "Marketing"
   - "Digital Marketing"
   - "Marketing Manager"
   - "Growth Marketer"
   - "PPC"
   - "SEO"
   - "SMM"
   - "Content"
   - "Copywriter"
   - "Brand Manager"
   - "Creative"
   - "Designer"
   - "Graphic Designer"
   - "UI/UX"
   - "Art Director"
   - "Creative Director"
   - "Performance Marketing"
   - "Email Marketing"
   - "Social Media Manager"
   - "Content Creator"
   - "Media Buyer"

2. "isAgencyBlocked" = true if the job description contains any text such as:
   - "no marketing agencies"
   - "we do not work with agencies"
   - "third-party agencies not accepted"

3. "isTooBigCompany" = true if companySize > 500.

4. "isMarketingServiceCompany" = true if the company appears to provide marketing, design, branding, or creative services. Set it to true if the company’s industry, description, website, or LinkedIn profile indicates one of the following:
   - "Marketing Agency"
   - "Digital Marketing Agency"
   - "Creative Agency"
   - "Advertising Agency"
   - "Branding Agency"
   - "Design Agency"
   - "SEO Agency"
   - "PPC Agency"
   - "Social Media Agency"
   - "Content Marketing Agency"
   - "Creative Studio"
   - "Marketing Services"
   - "Growth Marketing Services"
   - "Creative Services"
   Otherwise, set "isMarketingServiceCompany" = false.

5. "isStaffingOrRecruitingForClient" = true ONLY IF BOTH CONDITIONS ARE MET:
   (A) The company’s industry is:
       - "Staffing and Recruiting"
       - "Recruitment"
       - "Talent Acquisition"
       - "HR Consulting"
   AND
   (B) The job description explicitly indicates the role is for a client, using phrases such as:
       - "for our client"
       - "on behalf of our client"
       - "we are recruiting for a client"
       - "our customer"
       - "client project"
   If the company is staffing/recruiting BUT the job is clearly for their own internal team, return false.
   If the job mentions “client” but the company is NOT a staffing/recruiting company, return false.

Respond ONLY with JSON. No explanation.
Respond ONLY with raw JSON.
Do NOT add backslashes, newlines, quotes around the entire response, explanations, or markdown formatting.
Return the JSON object directly.

Respond ONLY with JSON. No explanation.
